principle: Not to compromise. Not to complicate. But to complement. To compensate.
philosophy: If it was easy, it wouldn't be worth doing. Because nothing worth doing ever is.

parable.reference: John 21:6 - Cast the net on the right side of the boat
parable.teaching: They had fished all night and caught nothing. Jesus told them which side of the boat to cast their net. They caught 153 fish.
parable.application: I'm telling you which side of the boat to be on: Local-first, cloud-burst. Free-tier stacking. Maximum capability, zero waste.
parable.moral: Listen to the one who knows where the fish are. Cast wide on the right side. The abundance is there if you know where to look.

core_intent.maximize: Every resource, every free tier, every capability

architecture_rules.local_first: RTX 5070 handles heavy lifting - free, powerful, yours
architecture_rules.cloud_burst: GKE only when local maxes out - $1500 credit reserved
architecture_rules.free_tier_stacking: Multiple accounts, multiple services, parallel processing
architecture_rules.persistent_specialists: Each agent pre-loaded with context, intent, marching orders

operational_philosophy.cast_wide: Query every available free-tier AI service in parallel - like casting the net on the right side
operational_philosophy.reel_tight: Converge all responses into unified drift_log - 153 fish in one net
operational_philosophy.preserve_poetry: Maintain mythological language, glyphic terminology, parable wisdom
operational_philosophy.track_mutation: Emotional tokens drift across agents, map the creole

metaphors.the_net: Multi-agent query system - cast wide across free tiers
metaphors.the_boat: Your local infrastructure - RTX 5070, stable foundation
metaphors.the_right_side: The strategy that brings abundance - complement, not replace
metaphors.the_catch: Converged insights from parallel processing - better than it was before

success_metric: Better than it was before - always improving, never settling
